name: Prismata
summary: A uniquely gripping hybrid strategy game like no other, inspired by RTS, deckbuilders, and tabletop strategy games. Outwit your foes by efficiently constructing and commanding a powerful cybernetic army. A radical achievement in game design, Prismata rewrites the rules of strategy games.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 策略、独立、纸牌
  • 发行日期: 2018年3月8日
  • 售价: ¥ 80
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/490220/Prismata/
